ObjectDescription
A Mappy T-shirt which can only be purchased at the shop. Wear this to stand out from the crowd! [#Legal]
Un T-shirt Mappy pouvant uniquement être acheté dans la boutique. Portez-le pour vous démarquer des autres ! [#Legal]
Ein Mappy-T-Shirt, das nur im Shop erhältlich ist. Tragen Sie es, um sich von den anderen abzuheben! [#Legal]
Una T-shirt Mappy che può essere acquistata solo al negozio. Indossala e distinguiti dalla folla! [#Legal]
Camiseta Mappy que solo puede comprarse en la tienda. ¡Póntela para llamar la atención! [#Legal]
ショップ限定マッピーTシャツです。これを着用して他の人と差をつけよう！[#Legal]
샵 한정 판매 마피 티셔츠입니다. 남들하고는 달라야죠! [#Legal]
A Mappy T-shirt which can only be purchased at the shop. Wear this to stand out from the crowd! [#Legal]
本店限定的Mappy T恤。穿起它讓自己與別不同吧！[#Legal]
本店限定的Mappy T恤。穿起它讓自己與眾不同吧！[#Legal]
This standard black T-shirt gets a splash of color with both Mappy (back) and Goro (front) in brilliant pixel-style artwork![#Legal]
